definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣装在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: Climb down nets, and embark the lifeboat over manropes, everyone.
sentences.chinese: 每个人爬下救生网，用扶手绳登上救生艇。

sentences.english: ' he said, raising his head from the arm of the great chair, in which he reclined.
sentences.chinese: 他说，从他靠着的大椅子扶手上抬起头来。

sentences.english: EHC handrails are approved by all major escalator handrail manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 依合斯扶手带经各扶梯生产厂商批准。

sentences.english: The upper staircase is suspended from the ceiling by white rods that create a minimal balustrade.
sentences.chinese: 上层楼梯利用从天花板悬挂下的白棒作为扶手栏杆。

sentences.english: He dozed off in the armchair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在扶手椅里打盹儿。

sentences.english: There were classical shaped concrete handrails along zig-zag running terrace – strongest element.
sentences.chinese: 沿着之字形平台的经典混凝土扶手是最强有力的元素。

sentences.english: The railings on this side have just been whitewashed and can fade easily.
sentences.chinese: 这边的扶手才刚粉刷过，很容易掉色。

sentences.english: He lounged in an left armchair in a stance of deliberconsumed contempt.
sentences.chinese: 他懒洋洋地躺在扶手椅里，用意摆出一种藐视的架势。

sentences.english: On both sides of the seat were armrests , with a lion standing beside each of them.
sentences.chinese: 宝座两旁有扶手，靠近扶手有两个狮子站立。

sentences.english: On both sides of the seat were armrests , with a lion standing beside each of them.
sentences.chinese: 宝座两旁有扶手，靠近扶手有两个狮子站立。

sentences.english: I saw him sitting back in the armchair, drinking his beer.
sentences.chinese: 我看见他背靠扶手椅而坐，喝着啤酒。

sentences.english: The heaving of the ship made her dizzy and she leanedagainst the handrail.
sentences.chinese: 轮船的起伏让她头晕眼花，她斜靠在扶手上。

sentences.english: Hand rails and banisters shall be constructed for stainless steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 扶手和栏杆支柱为不锈钢制。

sentences.english: In his armchair in the parlour looking out on the road.
sentences.chinese: 他在客厅的扶手椅上望着外面的道路。

definition: pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
